website_summaries.verdict: The 27-inch Samsung LC27F591FDN is an attractive and affordable curved-screen gaming monitor that uses AMD's FreeSync technology to deliver solid gaming performance.

customer_reviews.title: Great monitor. Couple of issues.
customer_reviews.text: I can only pick out two problems with this monitor. One of which I'm not too bothered about. Firstly it's a tad small, but this shouldn't matter if you are as close to the monitor as you should be. My but the main problem for me is that there is only 1 HDMI port which makes it a pain to switch between pc and console. Adapters are available to buy but that's not the point. Overall great product. Looks clean and the screen is fantastic and responsive. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Connor T.

customer_reviews.title: Great monitor - Very easy on the eyes
customer_reviews.text: Great monitor - Very easy on the eyes, It also has a built in 'Eye care' option that basically does the same that the program 'FLUX' would do, Effectively puts a yellow tinge to the screen and dulls the brightness to make it less harsh.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Earl

customer_reviews.title: Excellent monitor
customer_reviews.text: I use two of these monitors side by side as part of a work station. These connect to my docking station quite easily, and the screens look amazing. I have used these for almost a year and could not have chosen anything better. I have also used these for gaming with a ps4 and the graphics look great, with no input lag observed either, my preferred screen to game with as well as work with.
customer_reviews.author: Dr Ahmed

customer_reviews.title: Not as great as the reviews
customer_reviews.text: I was very excited at getting this after reading the specs and the reviews for this Samsung monitor. However, it has not lived up to the hype. For videos and photo work it seems pretty good. For ordinary work on Office and internet browsing, it really lacks the clarity on text and numbers. There appears no way to improve the sharpness unless I increase the zoom on the screen. Perhaps this is more for gamers. Disappointed! :-(
customer_reviews.author: Kiran

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful ultra clear screens
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful ultra clear screens......made a huge difference. The curve is very gentle on the screens and works very well. Highly recommended for any designers.
customer_reviews.author: KAPIL CHAWLA

customer_reviews.title: Great picture, poor connection sensing after power save
customer_reviews.text: A lovely bright crisp detailed display. While I’ve tried multiple connection types with my computer, I find it Difficult to get the monitor to come on again after any power save shut off has engaged. Waking via the computer by moving the mouse etc doesn’t seem To do it and a lot of time can be wasted resolving.
customer_reviews.author: Tony

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: Good stuff: Nice size monitor, the curve is really nice and does seem easier on the eye than a flat screen, the build quality seems fine and the monitor tilt adjustment is nice (not height adjust), nice colour saturation and blacks. Bad stuff: Picture quality was awful, excessive posterization, faint horizontal lines across the whole screen, a real disappointment.
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Excellent!
customer_reviews.text: My first experience of a curved screen and, I like it. I bought the monitor as a replacement for a very old one which had no digital input - and no integral sound either. Picture is excellent and sound quite acceptable but not as good as my standalone sound system (which I didn't expect anyway).
customer_reviews.author: Johnab

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for gaming
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this. Bought primarily for gaming. Great picture. Can’t say I’ve experienced any lag at all. Not sure that the curve adds anything other than aesthetics, but it doesn’t detract from what is a quality product at the price Recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Steve G

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: I use this for Office mostly and programs like InDesign but also for games, and I have to say it's very good. It's limit is its resolution but it stretches without problem to 27" and of course it's the maximum for many video cards. It's lovely to look at in terms of design and it's surprisingly neat - the curve seems to mean it takes up less space than my old 24" monitor. I'd recommend this without reservation especially given its pretty reasonable price.
customer_reviews.author: Justin

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Good sized screen with a crisp clean image. Replaced my 2 year old LG OLED screen with this as was bigger. I have always preferred LGs but this screen and image is up there with the best of them. Highly recomend ad once you get used to the curve it really does draw you into the screen when playing games and eyes are far less tired while working on spreadsheets!
customer_reviews.author: Me

customer_reviews.title: Really bad.
customer_reviews.text: Fonts look fuzzy. I definitely cannot use this for office work. I am connected to a macbook pro through hdmi. Have tried adjusting all possible font aliasing settings. I am going to return this for a higher def display. IMO the curved display does not add any value and is a gimmick.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. B. Stokes

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely perfect for what I need.
customer_reviews.text: Brilliant screen - and even more brilliant when I discovered that I could mount it on a cantilevered wall mount - despite all the naysayers who said you can not! You need a 75 cm capable cantilever and an adaptor (both currently Amazon Choice). But you need to also have a bit of DIY savvy because you have to cut 3.5 cm off the bottom of the metal mounting plate to allow com plugs to fit on the screen. I am absolutely and completely thrilled with my (now mounted and completely flexible) screen!
customer_reviews.author: Iain D.

customer_reviews.title: Upgrade from this
customer_reviews.text: The monitor's resolution is not enough for the size. In general the picture is pretty bad. The monitor is also NOT height adjustable, therefore you never look at it from quite the right angle. It also keeps disconnecting from my MAC, which gets annoying over time. A good flat higher resolution monitor is going to be cheaper and better than this. I don't see much point in getting this one.
customer_reviews.author: Eleanor

customer_reviews.title: Love this monitor
customer_reviews.text: Great monitor. Bought it for working on, not gaming. Great screen for the price (purchased in Prime Day sale.) Only design feature I would change is control button at the back of the monitor- a bit awkward to use. Overall, a great buy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Oh Wow, These are great.
customer_reviews.text: I love these curved 1920x1080p monitors. They are very sleek and professional looking and give my office a great vibe. The also have an incredible picture. I use them to game on after work so it is a win-win situation.
customer_reviews.author: NetworkTech4000

customer_reviews.title: So good i bought 2...
customer_reviews.text: A great product for a great price! The picture quality is great (for 1080p). The curvature makes the screens very nice and it is a great addition to my setup for gaming :-).. One very happy customer.
customer_reviews.author: Connor

customer_reviews.title: Excellent build quality and superb picture
customer_reviews.text: Nothing to dislike about this monitor. A huge upgrade on my old Dell 23" not only with picture quality but quality of build. Easy to use menu with a subtle toggle joystick on the back of the monitor which I really like for discreetness, keeping the front clean and stylish. The screen itself is clear and the colours vivid for gaming. Overall very happy and I would recommend especially for £200 which I think is a bargain for what you get.
customer_reviews.author: mrbungle

customer_reviews.title: Good screen, disappointed height can’t be adjusted
customer_reviews.text: I use this for work so can’t comment on gaming - that may be an unfair score. I do like this screen, however it is a fixed height which is incredibly annoying I’m having to put in a shelf to make it easier to work at my desk and sit this on as it is quite low. It is perhaps in the spec but I didn’t notice that so just fair warning to all out there.
customer_reviews.author: shoe addict

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased the screen a few months ago not even a year and the screen started to flick so I contacted the support team (Kia) and with a simple step pressing the power bottom for 10 seconds and turning it on again the screen came back to normal function. I am happy again with my purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Lynette

customer_reviews.title: Love this screen
customer_reviews.text: Had this about a year now and one of my best buys, screen display is superb, quality of build is sturdy and stylish. Glare isn't a prob despite the angle been unfavourable for it. I am starting to become a bit of a samsung fan as every product I seem to purchase I highly rate.
customer_reviews.author: Craig Gaynor

customer_reviews.title: Audio Problem Through Headphone Jack
customer_reviews.text: Picture quality is good on the monitor. However the rear headphone jack outputted audio with annoying interference. This interference manifested itself as loud buzzing. I tried different inputs (two different PCs) and different electrical circuits (Office and Home) to see if the problem could be resolved. Seriously annoying and makes me regret this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Luke

customer_reviews.title: Aamzing item. I use for IT work as well as professional photoshop work
customer_reviews.text: One of the best items. I have tried and returned two other screens. But this item is amazing. Quality, sound and everything. I use it for work and also photoshop editing. It is very useful in both aspects.
customer_reviews.author: AK

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful screen but issues and dpi non functional.
customer_reviews.text: This is a beautiful monitor however what let it down was the fact it only has one hdmi port. In absence of the second hdmi I planned on using the DPI cable to hdmi however there seems to be a fault with this port. I would have exchanged but in my haste I disposed of all packaging. I am disappointed as now I need to keep switching between ports and wasted money on buying a dpi to hdmi cable which has proved useless. Quite disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Shabina Azmi

customer_reviews.title: Great looking monitor
customer_reviews.text: Monitor looks great, colour of picture has nice tones, sound it pretty loud when turned up which i was surprised about. easy to change the settings and switch between HDMI and VGA. Really impressed
customer_reviews.author: ray

customer_reviews.title: A good overall second monitor
customer_reviews.text: This is a good monitor with decent built in speakers. It would benefit from having an adjustable height stand though.
customer_reviews.author: Fruitmuncher

customer_reviews.title: Arrived damaged
customer_reviews.text: Looks like it might be a nice addition to any home set-up. Decent size and looks good. Mine arrived damaged with a huge, 2-inch wide dead strip down the middle of the screen. It's been dropped or mishandled somewhere along the way :( Amazon no longer have them in stock for a replacement. Whole thing has been a headache to be honest.
customer_reviews.author: Lesley

customer_reviews.title: The picture is crisp and the quality is great, I use it for gaming on console and ...
customer_reviews.text: The picture is crisp and the quality is great, I use it for gaming on console and pc. I got the one without speakers (but who buys a monitor for the speakers anyway) which doesn’t cause a problem as I either use external speakers or a headset. Overall this product is superb.
customer_reviews.author: william

customer_reviews.title: Good monitor for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Good one for the price. I have only one issue with it: After trying various setups it is still too bright, and can light up quarter of my room size. This one definitely needs anti-blue light goggles.
customer_reviews.author: Miklos

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Needed this as a second screen to my first one. Overal set up looks great. It’s easy to install so I’d recommend
customer_reviews.author: D

customer_reviews.title: Beutiful monitor, good quality.
customer_reviews.text: 1080 for a 27 inches is quite in the edge. I'd be happier with a better resolution but wouldn't have this price. As good as it can be.
customer_reviews.author: gabriel abadi

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Great. As big as you want to go for 1080p. But of fiddling to get the picture right. But good when you do. Also freesync now works perfectly with nvida.
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: So far so good set up easy picture quality fabulous sound as good ...
customer_reviews.text: So far so good set up easy picture quality fabulous sound as good as it could be for 2 small Inbuilt speakers and connections for all types of items ! The curve just looks great in the office
customer_reviews.author: David G. Millen

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic monitor
customer_reviews.text: This is a fantastic monitor – stunning display, and looks great. I bought it from Amazon along with a Lenovo compact desktop PC and a Jelly Comb compact keyboard, and it’s great setup on my small desk. Five stars - highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: IanJ

customer_reviews.title: Bought this to improve my posture at my desk. ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to improve my posture at my desk. No need for two screens anymore. Then when work is finished I can view HD iPlayer or Netflix.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Monitor
customer_reviews.text: The monitor fine does what it say it does picture ok only thing it goes black screen for maybe a second.nearly crash in simulators games
customer_reviews.author: wayne osborne

customer_reviews.title: Impressed
customer_reviews.text: I was not after a gaming monitor so can't judge it for that purpose. As I use my computer for picture editing and streaming film and TV shows, I purely wanted it for its picture quality and I have to say it has not disappointed. Crisp text, clear bright colours and pure dark blacks. I'm not saying it's the best but at the price I would think it difficult to find better.
customer_reviews.author: Pat

customer_reviews.title: Great, I would buy again.
customer_reviews.text: Great monitor! I was surprised on how much a curved screen close up improves the image and is very easy on the eyes. Have been using for a couple of months now. Built in Speakers to keep my desk tidy. Good quality sound; however, if I could have upgraded the speakers, I would have; can always add a separate set of speakers, but for day use, music, you tube etc, it is ideal. Great value and even better as price reduce soon after purchase; typical!
customer_reviews.author: Daz

customer_reviews.title: Clarity
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely brilliant monitor. You get what you pay for. A little more expensive than I intended but the reviews were good. Do not do gaming therefore unable to give a veiw
customer_reviews.author: W.R.Hooley

customer_reviews.title: Great curved monitor
customer_reviews.text: Love this monitor. It looks really great and the picture quality is also fantastic. There isn't anything bad about this monitor. Looks great if surfing the internet or playing computer games. I love the fact there are no buttons on the front of the monitor, which adds to its minimalist look.
customer_reviews.author: DanM

customer_reviews.title: Ghosting
customer_reviews.text: I mainly use this monitor for work. I noticed pretty bad ghosting after setting the response time to fastest. Changing the response time to standard reduces the issue, but because of the ghosting, the monitor only gets two stars.
customer_reviews.author: A Jama

customer_reviews.title: Good screen and excellent deal at the time
customer_reviews.text: The curved screen is working well. I am happy with the product since I have moved from a very old LCD screen to this new one. But I would have like if this one had a TV tuner.
customer_reviews.author: yanness77

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic monitor
customer_reviews.text: We bought this monitor as an upgrade from our existing one. Worth every penny, crystal clear, great sound. We will be using it for a combination of gaming and working from home so its perfect for us.
customer_reviews.author: I Just Did

customer_reviews.title: Big Monitor for big spreadsheets... 👍
customer_reviews.text: I use it for spreadsheets, therefore I'm not necessarily fussed about resolution, pixels, refresh rate... Big monitor, means I can get more on the screen. 👍
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A great Monitor
customer_reviews.text: All good as described, Good price and delivered on time.
customer_reviews.author: C. Urquhart

customer_reviews.title: Excellent monitor
customer_reviews.text: This product is very good and a crisp clear picture
customer_reviews.author: Michael McBride

customer_reviews.title: Crisp image.
customer_reviews.text: Like the screen, would buy a larger one next time.
customer_reviews.author: David Howells

customer_reviews.title: Good for Gaming
customer_reviews.text: My Son loves this for Gaming, Nice picture and decent price
customer_reviews.author: A. Moore

customer_reviews.title: Picture perfect
customer_reviews.text: This is absolutely awesome, graphics and sound quality are Fab, really great price of kit and at a great price
customer_reviews.author: Peter Robins

customer_reviews.title: Would recommend
customer_reviews.text: Excellent item I use this for gaming not had any problems. Would recommend this item.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Kunde

customer_reviews.title: Used product sold as new
customer_reviews.text: My product had already been used. The bags had been ripped, the protective plastic coating had been taken off the product and left inside the bags. I took pictures as I took out of the box. Very disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: maxine tran

customer_reviews.title: Not Silver
customer_reviews.text: Just to say. Havent tried these yet. But ordered the ones without speakers. They are not silver as specified, but are actually midnight blue.
customer_reviews.author: RichH

customer_reviews.title: Usual Samsung good quality
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this purchase. Lovely and clear and bright.
customer_reviews.author: Joe P

customer_reviews.title: Fab
customer_reviews.text: Could do with two hdmi ports but a part from that it’s great to have a curved screen without breaking the bank
customer_reviews.author: I tell the truth

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic monitor for a home office
customer_reviews.text: This is a fantastic monitor for a home office. Beautiful curved lines, colours and nice speakers.
customer_reviews.author: D & C

customer_reviews.title: Great screen!
customer_reviews.text: Great screen!! The image quality is excellent, the only qualms I have with this are that the screen has to be manually switched on from sleeping when I turn my pc on (via hdmi input).
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Look and View
customer_reviews.text: I like the product and it works as per as my requirements. Thanks.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sexy
customer_reviews.text: SHINEY!!! Seriously this monitor is the best i have owned, the smaller curved screens seem very imersive provided you can sit the correct distance away.
customer_reviews.author: James Crosland

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely love these monitors
customer_reviews.text: Awesome monitor, have just bought a second one to double - crystal clear picture, excellent curve, speakers are ok but use a headset so not bothered.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic product!
customer_reviews.text: Great buy, does exactly what I need it to do. Crisp as well as sharp display. Speakers are good enough for what you pay for!
customer_reviews.author: AAH22

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Good quality for gaming and is very sleek but, only one HDMI port. Although it only has one HDMI port as its simple and neat I have no problem with just using separate HDMI cables for my consoles and just switching them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good Value
customer_reviews.text: Great screen for the price although the size of it does mean that the 1080P resolution isn't as sharp as smaller monitors. Brought for PS4 play and occasional PC use so for me it's great. Curve is good for immersion :)
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Marcus J. Beavon

customer_reviews.title: It did what it said on the tin and a little bit more
customer_reviews.text: Compact enough to fit in my gaming space and the curve gives that immersive feel. Looks very smart and easy to set up . For the price this monitor really is all things to all people. Very very pleased .
customer_reviews.author: james marrtin

customer_reviews.title: Highly rated.
customer_reviews.text: Brilliant monitor, fantastic for gaming. Great picture, curve is a great touch too.
customer_reviews.author: Holly B.

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my son for his gaming. He loves it. Picture quality is great and sound is very good.
customer_reviews.author: Nicola

customer_reviews.title: but it's nice. Well done Samsung
customer_reviews.text: Very high quality monitor, the curving is not incredibly helpful, but it's nice. Well done Samsung!
customer_reviews.author: Francesco

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: This monitor is amazing, I haven’t got a PC yet so I’m using it as a screen for my Xbox and it works great. It’s a decent size and the sound and picture quality is great. I got it in the prime day deals for £160 I think, and it’s worth every penny
customer_reviews.author: Natasha M.

customer_reviews.title: The envy of others
customer_reviews.text: This is one smart screen, stylish and real high quality, the envy of many others
customer_reviews.author: Davuart

customer_reviews.title: Ideal for Gaming
customer_reviews.text: Sound and picture quality are really good, and the curve means it looks good too.
customer_reviews.author: joe

customer_reviews.title: Very good graphics
customer_reviews.text: Used the product for gaming very high quality and worth buying
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Garbage
customer_reviews.text: After litterly 5 minutes of use a line appears on the screen. Terrible
customer_reviews.author: Tony

customer_reviews.title: WOW, I mean absolutely beautiful.
customer_reviews.text: WOW, I mean absolutely beautiful. The picture looks great and the screen looks very sharp.
customer_reviews.author: Alain

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful👌🏽
customer_reviews.text: I never thought a computer monitor could be so beautiful. It was actually so bright I had to turn the brightness down. Colours are great and images look sharp coming from a Mac via hdmi. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: A

customer_reviews.title: Great item
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a gift for my son, he loves it can't fault anything
customer_reviews.author: Chez

customer_reviews.title: Quality product
customer_reviews.text: Looks great in gaming room everyone has commented on it
customer_reviews.author: andrew

customer_reviews.title: Computer monitor
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product. Birthday present for one of my sons, he loves it, mind you with my oldish eyes it's a little bright for me :)
customer_reviews.author: Basil C. Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Using it as a spare screen for work and it’s fantastic value for money
customer_reviews.author: Harish V

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: In use as the monitor for a Mac mini - picture is fantastic, curve is actually useful rather then gimmicky. Bought from amazon warehouse during the 20% off sale so for only £160 its a great buy.
customer_reviews.author: Techbuyer

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Works well, and has a good screen quality. Bought in Amazon sale so was very good vaule.
customer_reviews.author: Hammers

customer_reviews.title: Great picture quality
customer_reviews.text: I cannot rate this product for gaming as I don’t play, picture quality great, I just wish that my employer provided such a good screen
customer_reviews.author: Box Garden

customer_reviews.title: Great looking screen
customer_reviews.text: Being used for games and Blu-Ray. Great picture, nice curved screeen. Looks great.
customer_reviews.author: PG

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: So far good will do more when I had longer.
customer_reviews.author: DOBBY

customer_reviews.title: Spot on.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product and easy on the eyes. Flickers in and out from time to time because of connection with cable. But otherwise very good!
customer_reviews.author: Dylan Michael Kennett

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Use for work, not gaming, but great quality and value for money!
customer_reviews.author: jlivesey69

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic monitor, adore the curved aspect
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic monitor, adore the curved aspect. For someone who didn't know much about monitors I am very happy with the product.
customer_reviews.author: Alex Lieven

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: amazing easy to set up, and the curved screen works so much better
customer_reviews.author: sunsurfer

customer_reviews.title: Good quality picture
customer_reviews.text: Nice screen. Very neat. Would recommend it. Would consider getting a second one.
customer_reviews.author: Adrian

customer_reviews.title: I cannot adjust my screen
customer_reviews.text: Hi I tried out the menu system and I saw screen adjustment but when I tried to press on it I cant, it will not let me
customer_reviews.author: Liz Nguyen

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: it really is very very good! Clear, crisp, easy to set up and adjust...
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great experience for Gaming
customer_reviews.text: Amazing monitor, perfect size for my desk. Looks great with much iMac. Fantastic picture resolution for gaming on my Xbox one and the curved feature to the monitor makes my gaming experience even better! Reasonable price for such a good quality monitor. Definitely recommended for gamers on console and PC
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It is a curved monitor and 27inchs
customer_reviews.text: Not the best for gaming, it is only 60Hz refresh rate. No speaker. But is is worth for daily working and watching videos.
customer_reviews.author: Shaoheng Yan

customer_reviews.title: A Good Allround Monitor
customer_reviews.text: Ease of setup & the clarity of the screen makes this monitor good for most general users, no faults found as of yet
customer_reviews.author: P. J. Morovic

customer_reviews.title: Great piece of tech,
customer_reviews.text: Great piece of tech for the price, has made my games much more visually appealing compared to my older '1080p' tv. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Alastair Neill

customer_reviews.title: propah good
customer_reviews.text: propa quality bit of kit. well easy to set up. cop yourselves one of deese and you'll be havin a mental time
customer_reviews.author: Dylan Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: For the money, it's great. Though if you are moving from a 4k screen you may be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: James N

customer_reviews.title: favourite monitor I've ever had!
customer_reviews.text: Best monitor I have ever owned. The curve is great

customer_reviews.title: Usual high quality from Samsung
customer_reviews.text: Stunning... excellent quality ... what else would you expect from Samsung?
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Truly amazing. Very well packaged and easy set up
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased 2 of these and cannot rate them enough! Truly amazing. Very well packaged and easy set up. LOVE THEM
customer_reviews.author: Breathe for Cameron

customer_reviews.title: solid monitor good viewing angle on it and can be over clocked ...
customer_reviews.text: solid monitor good viewing angle on it and can be over clocked to 70/80Hz if u are so inclined wld recommend if u only want 1 monitor or only can have 1 monitor set up
customer_reviews.author: Bryn Davies

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Loving it the size is just right and the curve is amazing. The picture quality is quite good as well and its glare free.
customer_reviews.author: Adrian Waka

product_meta.title: Samsung C27F591 27 inch Curved LED Monitor - HDMI, Displayport, VGA, Speakers
product_meta.description:
Style Name:Speakers, HDMI, DisplayportIt features inbuilt 2 x 5W speakers along with the triple interface to enjoy all of your content through multiple devices. AMD FreeSync ensures flawlessly smooth gameplay. Instantly optimising screen colours and contrast, Game Mode ensures you get to see game scenes at their best. The rapid 4 ms video response time renders even the fastest on-screen movement.

BOX CONTAINS
LC27F591FDUXEN Monitor
UK Power Cable
HDMI Cable
Quick Installation Guide
Installation CD
feature_bullets: Enjoy a truly immersive viewing experience
Power Supply Type : 14 Volts/3.22 Amps , Power Consumption (Typical) : 36 Watts , Power Consumption (Stand-by) : 0.3 Watts

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars679 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
